Text:
quality's good. 

thanks for uploading this and the other one eztv. don't get them aired in australia for a while after you guys

This is an incredible series.

I really would love to support it by watching it on TV but that's not an option for me.

If you can, give this show the viewer base it deserves. Try watch it on the box ;)

Thanks

Thanks eztv! You provide a priceless service. Great shows like Breaking Bad, Big Love, Parks & Recreation, United States of Tara etc are aired sooooo much later on Australian TV. Season 1 of Breaking Bad has just finished airing on free to air here *shah*
Thank you EZTV for uploading TV so I don't need one...
eztv, I keep on seeing that name. Thanks for your great quality and selection. =]

Thanks EZTV - you are a god.

barryosterburg:  wtf?  I'm guessing that you MEANT to say: "Fuck, EZTV, you bad." ...right?  All ebonics 'n' shit, raih?  Well, you sound like a complete moron.  Do it right kid, or don't do it at all.
thanks again, man....you have brought a lot of pleasure and entertainment to my life.  Just know that you are really appreciated.
